title: The Moment of Truth
description: Tensions run high in this thrilling installment of the best-selling Jedi Quest seriesMasters and apprentices must trust one another. But that is not the case with Anakin Skywalker and his Master, Obi-Wan Kenobi. A rift is building between them. When they are separated during a rescue mission on a dangerous planet, their conflict reaches a new high -- and shows signs of things to come.
author: Jude Watson
